title: Staff Backend Engineer
location: Work where you want, when you want
description: Architect and scale AI-driven DeFi backend infrastructure, integrating EVM smart contracts, real-time analytics, and decentralized governance tools.
fullDescription:
BaseBuzz is building the next-generation AI-powered DeFi ecosystem on Base. We enable seamless trading, governance, and real-world asset tokenization, powered by $BASEBUZZ. Our ecosystem includes high-impact projects like Rugtron3000, MemePro, and JobsOnBase—all designed for maximum on-chain engagement. 

Joining BaseBuzz means being part of a lean, high-impact team that’s reshaping the future of DeFi through automation, AI, and trustless smart contract systems.
responsibilities: Architect, develop, and scale high-performance backend systems.
Build and optimize decentralized infrastructure, integrating EVM-based smart contracts, wallets, and on-chain data services.
Lead end-to-end technical projects—ensuring reliability, security, and performance.
Maintain high-quality, well-tested code, conducting peer reviews to uphold best practices.
Develop and scale APIs, data pipelines, and real-time transaction systems for on-chain analytics and trading.
Innovate on scalable, trustless reward systems to automate $BASEBUZZ incentives, reputation scores, and governance mechanisms.

mustHave: 8+ years of backend engineering experience, including scaling high-performance, real-time systems.
Strong background in TypeScript, Go, or Rust for backend development.
Experience designing and building distributed systems, cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP), and database architectures.
Deep understanding of EVM smart contracts, DeFi protocols, and on-chain data indexing.
Ability to independently drive projects and own technical decisions in a fast-moving, decentralized team.
Strong security mindset—understanding of MEV, frontrunning, smart contract risks, and best practices.
Passion for DeFi, AI-driven trading, and decentralized governance.
niceToHave: Experience working with Subgraphs, The Graph, GraphQL, or custom blockchain data pipelines.
Familiarity with zkSync, Base, Layer 2 scaling, or bridging mechanisms.
Contributions to open-source DeFi protocols or on-chain trading bots.
A deep understanding of on-chain MEV, gas optimization, and Solidity contract tuning.

benefits: Deep DeFi integration—access governance influence & project upside.
On-chain reputation tracking—build your verified Web3 work history.
No VC overlords—this is a community-driven DeFi project.
